full_description:
Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation

The AirPods Pro 2nd generation has been re-engineered to deliver up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation. It offers Adaptive Transparency reducing external noise, while Personalized Spatial Audio which immerses you in sound. With a single charge, it can deliver up to 6 hours of battery life. Touch control lets you easily adjust the volume with a swipe. The revamped MagSafe Charging Case comes with its own Precision Finding, a built-in speaker, and a lanyard loop.

Superior audio quality

The Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation is powered by an upgraded H2 chip. It offers smarter noise cancellation and three-dimensional sound. Adaptive EQ tunes music to your ears in real time to deliver crisp, clean high notes and deep, rich bass in stunning clarity.

Up to 2x more noise cancellation

Apple AirPods Pro now cancels twice as much unwanted noise, so nothing interrupts your listening during a commute and when you need to focus. And Adaptive Transparency reduces and adjusts the intensity of loud noises at 48,000 times per second, so you can comfortably stay connected to the world around you in any setting.

Personalized listening

Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Gen offers personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking that tailors the listening experience by precisely placing sound elements in the space around you. Adaptive EQ tunes music to your ears, so you hear consistently detailed playback, every time.

Expanded battery life

The Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Gen can offer up to 6 hours of listening time on a single charge, and up to 30 hours of listening time with the MagSafe Charging Case. You can recharge the MagSafe Charging Case with an Apple Watch or MagSafe charger. You can also use the Lightning connector or a Qi-certified charger.

Redesigned charging case

The re-engineered MagSafe Charging Case includes the U1 chip with Precision Finding to help you identify the location of your case. And if you’re nearby and it’s tucked away you can play sounds from the built-in speaker. A built-in lanyard loop lets you attach your case to a backpack or handbag, so it’s always within reach. And both AirPods Pro and the MagSafe Charging Case are built to brave the elements, with IPX4 sweat and water resistance.

More magical than ever

AirPods Pro 2nd generation delivers an even more effortless experience than the original model. It offers touch control which lets you manage playback functions from the stem and adjust volume with a light swipe up or down. You can easily share a song or show between any two sets of AirPods with Audio Sharing. AirPods Pro connects to your iPhone or Apple Watch, and sound moves seamlessly when you switch between your favorite Apple devices.

full_description:
Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation Wireless Earbuds with USB C Charging Case

The H2 chip enables a more tailored audio experience with Apple's 2nd generation AirPods Pro with Wireless MagSafe Charging Case, now with worldwide USB-C compatibility. The chip collaborates with a custom-built low-distortion driver, amplifier, and inward-facing mic in each ear to offer crisp highs, strong bass, and music that is tailored to your ear shape as you hear it. They also introduce a new dimension of sound with immersive Spatial Audio, which transports you to the stage alongside the band. Other improvements to the AirPods Pro include ANC with double the canceling strength, a transparency mode that adjusts to high-decibel noises, and more. But wait, there's more: when you pair your AirPods Pro with the separately available Apple Vision Pro, the H2 chip in these devices will communicate to transfer audio data at blisteringly fast speeds, delivering fully lossless audio with extremely low latency and elevating your mobile audio experience to incredible new heights. The Airpods Pro comes with four different sizes of silicone ear tip pairs as well as a USB-C charging cord.

A Revolutionary Entertainment Experience

AirPods Pro works in tandem with the Apple Vision Pro, which is sold separately, to offer lossless audio with ultralow latency for an unmatched sound experience. Both devices use the H2 chip, which communicates at breakneck speed and unlocks a groundbreaking new format that renders pure, uncompressed sound in real-time. As a result, your movies, programs, and games will be stunningly immersive.

Personalized Spatial Audio

In general, the capacity to generate Spatial Audio is intended to make you feel as if you're in the same room as the singer or band, or onstage at a performance, with voices and instruments sounding as if they're all around you. Spatial Audio with AirPods Pro is compatible with any device that supports Dolby Atmos content. This sound may be customized when coupled with an iPhone equipped with a TrueDepth camera. The TrueDepth camera analyzes the unique shape of your head to generate a Spatial Audio profile that can be effortlessly synchronized across compatible Apple devices.

Dynamic Head Tracking

This feature on compatible devices provides three-dimensional audio that repositions as you move your head. This results in a more natural listening experience, and Group FaceTime calls seem as if you're in the same room as friends and family.

Intelligent Noise Control

The H2-powered AirPods Pro now includes Adaptive Audio, which prioritizes sounds that require your attention as you travel around the globe. Adaptive Audio miraculously offers the ideal combination of sound for each setting by effortlessly mixing Active Noise Cancellation with Transparency mode as needed.

All-Day Battery

The 2nd generation AirPods Pro gives up to 6 hours of listening on a full charge with active noise reduction, with an additional 24 hours accessible within the charging case. It's as simple as putting the earbuds inside and shutting the lid to charge them. The charging case may be recharged wirelessly with a (optional) Apple Watch, MagSafe, or Qi-compatible charging pad, or with the accompanying Lightning to USB Type-C connector.

Seamless Switching

You can move between different iOS devices quickly and effortlessly with AirPods Pro. So, if you're listening to music on your iPad, you can swiftly switch to your iPhone to answer an incoming call using the AirPods.

AirPods and Accessibility

The AirPods Pro might make life simpler for folks who have selective hearing requirements. Conversation Boost focuses on the voices in front of you to assist you in having more natural conversations. Headphone accommodations can help you hear frequencies more clearly. Finally, you may hear others from a distance, such as a speaker in an auditorium, using Live Listen with your iPhone.

Clear Calls & Audio Sharing

The inward-facing microphone works with voice augmentation algorithms to detect your voice more naturally during phone and video calls. Share audio from your iOS smartphone between any two pairs of AirPods Pro. Bring the AirPods close to an iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV that you wish to listen to and you'll be instantly connected.
